EmailTemplate.name: NA_Enterprise_Manufacturing_Cold_Nurture.Manufacturing_Cold_Nurture_Enterprise_E
EmailTemplate.subject: Free CIO Guide to Autonomic IT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-cio-guide-to-autonomic-it]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The CIO that cannot deliver predictable performance while minimizing costs puts their business (and their job) at considerable risk. Are you seeking to transform your business through better and faster IT service delivery?
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-cio-guide-to-autonomic-it]]>
No matter what stage your organization is in today, an autonomic approach that allows workloads to self-manage on any infrastructure or cloud can help.
This free guide is your roadmap. <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-cio-guide-to-autonomic-it]]>
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
